net.sourceforge.waters.plain.module

Class SimpleNodeElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sourceforge.waters.plain.base.Element
      • net.sourceforge.waters.plain.base.AbstractNamedElement
        • net.sourceforge.waters.plain.base.NamedElement
          • net.sourceforge.waters.plain.module.NodeElement
            • net.sourceforge.waters.plain.module.SimpleNodeElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Comparable<NamedProxy>, ComparableProxy<NamedProxy>, NamedProxy, Proxy, NodeProxy, SimpleNodeProxy

    public final class SimpleNodeElement
extends NodeElement
implements SimpleNodeProxy
    An immutable implementation of the SimpleNodeProxy interface.
    Author:
    Robi Malik
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleNodeElement

        public SimpleNodeElement(String name,
                         PlainEventListProxy propositions,
                         Map<String,String> attributes,
                         boolean initial,
                         PointGeometryProxy pointGeometry,
                         PointGeometryProxy initialArrowGeometry,
                         LabelGeometryProxy labelGeometry)
        Creates a new simple node.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new simple node.
        propositions - The list of propositions of the new simple node, or null if empty.
        attributes - The attribute map of the new simple node, or null if empty.
        initial - The initial status of the new simple node.
        pointGeometry - The geometric position of the new simple node, or null.
        initialArrowGeometry - The position of the initial state arrow of the new simple node, or null.
        labelGeometry - The geometric position of the label of the new simple node, or null.

      • SimpleNodeElement

        public SimpleNodeElement(String name)
        Creates a new simple node using default values. This constructor creates a simple node with an empty list of propositions, an empty attribute map, the initial status set to false, the geometric position set to null, the position of the initial state arrow set to null, and the geometric position of the label set to null.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new simple node.

        public SimpleNodeElement clone()
        Description copied from class: Element
        Creates and returns a copy of this element. Immutable objects of the plain implementation are cloned by shallow copying. All contained objects are shared between an element and its clones.

      • getProxyInterface

        public Class<SimpleNodeProxy> getProxyInterface()
        Description copied from interface: Proxy
        Returns the most specific proxy interface implemented by this object. This method must return one of the leaf interfaces of the proxy hierarchy, e.g. EventProxy, not any specific implementation class. This can be used by equality visitors to ensure that objects from different implementations are considered as equal.
        Specified by:
        getProxyInterface in interface Proxy

      • getPointGeometry

        public PointGeometryProxy getPointGeometry()
        Description copied from interface: SimpleNodeProxy
        Gets the geometric position of this node.
        Specified by:
        getPointGeometry in interface SimpleNodeProxy
        Returns:
        A PointGeometryProxy identifying the position of the center of the circle representing this node in a graph.

      • getInitialArrowGeometry

        public PointGeometryProxy getInitialArrowGeometry()
        Description copied from interface: SimpleNodeProxy
        Gets the position of the initial state arrow of this node. Initial nodes can be rendered using a small arrow pointing against the node. This attribute defines the relative position of the start point of that arrow. It only make sense for initial nodes and should be null in all other cases.
        Specified by:
        getInitialArrowGeometry in interface SimpleNodeProxy
        Returns:
        A PointGeometryProxy identifying the start point of the initial state arrow relative to the centre of the node.

      • getLabelGeometry

        public LabelGeometryProxy getLabelGeometry()
        Description copied from interface: SimpleNodeProxy
        Gets the geometric position of the label of this node.
        Specified by:
        getLabelGeometry in interface SimpleNodeProxy
        Returns:
        A PointGeometryProxy identifying the position of the label's anchor point relative to the center of the circle representing the node.

      • getImmediateChildNodes

        public Set<NodeProxy> getImmediateChildNodes()
        Description copied from interface: NodeProxy
        Gets the set of immediate child nodes of this group node. This method returns the set of simple nodes or group nodes that are directly contained in this group node.
        Specified by:
        getImmediateChildNodes in interface NodeProxy
        Returns:
        An unmodifiable set of nodes.
